description: Lists all the tags for a specified resource, including key and value.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource (such as the dataset or model) that is the focus of the ListTagsForResource operation.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Any tags associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key for the specified tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the specified tag.
